articles.author: Alan Sepinwall
articles.title: ‘American Primeval’ Is a Bloody Slog Through the Old West - Rolling Stone
articles.description: Netflix miniseries starring Taylor Kitsch and Betty Gilpin offers a thin story that wallows in violence.
articles.content:
“There is only brutality here.” 
This is a line from a letter that a U.S. Army captain, played by Lucas Neff, writes to his loved ones back home, midway through the new Netflix miniseries American P… [+3524 chars]

articles.title: Is bird flu the next pandemic? What to know after the first H5N1 death in the US - AOL
articles.description: With reports of the first human death from bird flu in the US, some Americans are feeling an uncomfortable flashback to the early days of Covid-19, when infectious disease experts were talking about a new virus that was sending people to the hospital with res…
